thread.title: Jeremy Corbyn vould be preparing to quit
thread.title_full: Jeremy Corbyn vould be preparing to quit

title: Jeremy Corbyn vould be preparing to quit
text: comments Jeremy Corbyn has given his inner circle of MPs the date he will depart as leader of the party, it has been claimed. The Labour leader, who has faced an embarrassing week in the Commons after shadow cabinet ministers defied him, has apparently announced a 'departure date'. The claim has been made in a series of tweets on Wednesday morning from a social affairs editor in a Labour stronghold. Jeremy Corbyn has given his inner circle of MPs the date he will depart as leader of the party, it has been claimed The claims have been made in a series of tweets on Wednesday morning from social affairs editor Jennifer Williams in a Labour stronghold Jennifer Williams, social affairs editor of the Manchester Evening News, wrote: 'Am told Corbyn has given a departure date to his close circle. Hence the frenzy.' She quickly adds: 'Single sourced, I would add. Just to be total disclosure.' RELATED ARTICLES
